description: Three practical quizzes (4% each) assessing content from specific practical sessions, and submission of a Laboratory Notebook (10%) presenting experimental data and discussion questions from Weeks 2-4 and 7-8 practicals.
1-hour test covering Weeks 1-5 lecture material with multiple-choice, short response, and essay questions. Conducted in Week 7.
10-minute individual presentation with 5-minute Q&A on RNA-seq analysis from Practical 5 and independent literature research. Presented during Week 9 lab sessions.
1-hour exam during formal examination period assessing Weeks 7-10 lecture material with multiple-choice, short response, and essay questions.
